daily_workouts.outdoor_workout: Warm-up: 10min easy jog + dynamic stretching. Main: 4x200m hurdles rhythm (13-15-16 steps), 90% effort, 3min rest. Cool down: 10min easy jog + static stretching.
daily_workouts.indoor_workout: Warm-up: 5min jumping jacks + dynamic stretching. Main: 4x30sec high knees, 4x30sec butt kicks, 4x10 jump squats, hurdle wall drills (20 each leg). Cool down: stretching routine.

daily_workouts.outdoor_workout: Warm-up: 800m easy jog. Main: Single-leg squats 3x12, Bulgarian split squats 3x10 each, box jumps 3x8, hurdle mobility sequence. Cool down: foam rolling.
daily_workouts.indoor_workout: Warm-up: 5min bodyweight cardio. Main: Bodyweight squats 3x15, lunges 3x12 each, wall sits 3x45sec, plank variations 3x30sec, hurdle flexibility routine.

daily_workouts.outdoor_workout: Warm-up: 10min jog + hurdle mobility. Main: Chair hurdle drills 3x10 each leg, cone rhythm work (7-8m apart), shadow hurdling 3x50m. Cool down: hip flexor stretching.
daily_workouts.indoor_workout: Warm-up: Dynamic stretching routine. Main: Chair/broomstick lead-leg drills 3x15, trail-leg wall drives 3x12, pogo hops 3x20, shuttle runs 4x10m.

daily_workouts.outdoor_workout: 20-30min easy jog, focus on relaxed running form. 15min dynamic stretching and mobility work. Optional: light core strengthening.
daily_workouts.indoor_workout: 20min yoga flow or stretching routine. Light core work: planks, side planks, dead bugs. Hip flexor and hamstring focus stretching.

daily_workouts.outdoor_workout: Warm-up: 12min progressive jog + drills. Main: 6x60m sprints at 95%, focus on first 3 steps explosive, 4min rest. Cool down: easy jog + stretching.
daily_workouts.indoor_workout: Warm-up: 8min dynamic movement. Main: 8x10sec max effort in place running, 6x5 explosive push-ups, 4x8 broad jumps, agility ladder work if available.

daily_workouts.outdoor_workout: Warm-up: 15min including strides. Main: 2x300m hurdles at race pace (target: sub-45s), focus on step patterns 13-15-16-17, 8min recovery. Cool down: extensive stretching.
daily_workouts.indoor_workout: Warm-up: Extended dynamic routine. Main: 4x45sec tempo runs in place, hurdle form practice (no hurdles), step pattern visualization, core finisher circuit.

daily_workouts.outdoor_workout: 30-40min easy aerobic run, conversational pace. Include 2x4min tempo pickups. Finish with 20min comprehensive stretching and foam rolling.
daily_workouts.indoor_workout: 45min yoga or pilates session. Focus on flexibility, core stability, and mental recovery. Include meditation or visualization of race performance.

form_drills.name: Lead-Leg Snap Overs
form_drills.description: Using a chair or broomstick as a hurdle, practice the lead leg motion
steps: Set up chair or broomstick at hip height
Stand 2 steps back from obstacle
Drive knee up and over, keeping toe flexed
Snap leg down fast and straight
Focus on quick ground contact
Repeat 10-15 times each leg
form_drills.key_points: Keep shoulders square, maintain forward lean, quick ground contact

form_drills.name: Trail-Leg Wall Drives
form_drills.description: Practice trail leg technique using a wall for support
steps: Stand arm's length from wall, facing sideways
Place hand on wall for balance
Lift outside leg into hurdle trail position
Drive knee forward and up
Keep foot turned out, knee high
Practice the cycling motion smoothly
form_drills.key_points: High knee drive, foot turned out, smooth cycling motion

form_drills.name: Cone Rhythm Drills
form_drills.description: Set up cones to practice step patterns between hurdles
steps: Place cones 7-8 meters apart (simulating hurdle spacing)
Practice 13 steps between first cones (early race)
Practice 15 steps between middle cones
Practice 16-17 steps between final cones (fatigue pattern)
Focus on maintaining rhythm and speed
Use tape indoors if no space for cones
form_drills.key_points: Consistent rhythm, maintain speed, practice all step patterns

form_drills.name: Shadow Hurdling
form_drills.description: Practice full hurdling motion without actual hurdles
steps: Set up phone to record side view
Mark spots where hurdles would be
Run through practicing hurdle technique
Film yourself for form analysis
Check for proper lead leg snap, trail leg drive
Look for smooth rhythm between hurdles
form_drills.key_points: Focus on technique, film for analysis, practice race rhythm

form_drills.name: Hip Mobility Drills
form_drills.description: Essential flexibility work for hurdle technique
steps: Leg swings: front-to-back and side-to-side (10 each)
Walking high knees (20 steps)
Walking butt kicks (20 steps)
Lunge with twist (8 each side)
Hurdle sit stretches (hold 30sec each)
Hip flexor stretches (hold 45sec each)
form_drills.key_points: Daily practice, gradual range increase, no bouncing
